test.name: alterPrimitiveBean
test.description: takes the bean {primitiveBoolean=true, primitiveByte=42, primitiveChar=A, primitiveDouble=1.5, primitiveFloat=4.5, primitiveInt=100000000, primitiveLong=999999999, primitiveShort=2000}, alters it a little bit and returns it

result.description: takes the bean {primitiveBoolean=true, primitiveByte=42, primitiveChar=A, primitiveDouble=1.5, primitiveFloat=4.5, primitiveInt=100000000, primitiveLong=999999999, primitiveShort=2000}, alters it a little bit and returns it

parameter.name: bean
parameter.value: {primitiveBoolean=true, primitiveByte=42, primitiveChar=A, primitiveDouble=1.5, primitiveFloat=4.5, primitiveInt=100000000, primitiveLong=999999999, primitiveShort=2000}

comparison.expectedValue: {primitiveBoolean=false, primitiveByte=43, primitiveChar=B, primitiveDouble=2.5, primitiveFloat=5.5, primitiveInt=100000001, primitiveLong=1000000000, primitiveShort=2001}
comparison.value: {primitiveBoolean=false, primitiveByte=43, primitiveChar=B, primitiveDouble=2.5, primitiveFloat=5.5, primitiveInt=100000001, primitiveLong=1000000000, primitiveShort=2001}
